articles.title: S. Korean "Constitutional Court" Decides on Impeaching Park
articles.content:
S. Korean "Constitutional Court" Decides on Impeaching Park
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The "Constitutional Court" of south Korea gave a verdict of impeaching Park Geun Hye on Friday amid the high-pitched public struggle demanding her impeachment, according to media reports from Seoul.
					 The "Constitutional Court" finally decided on impeachment of Park with the unanimous approval of its eight judges, after having examined for three months the motion on her impeachment which passed through the "National Assembly" on December 9 last year.
					
					 Park was thus ousted from her "presidency" a year before the expiration of tenure of her office and will reportedly face a thorough investigation as an ordinary criminal.

articles.title: Holy War for Making Clean Sweep of Nuclear Warmongers Called for
articles.content:
Holy War for Making Clean Sweep of Nuclear Warmongers Called for
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Religious Believers Council of Korea (RBCK) released a statement on Friday to lash out at the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for working hard to inflict a horrible nuclear war upon the Korean nation.
					 As reported, the U.S. and south Korean warmongers on March 1 kicked off their nearly two-month long joint military drills targeting the DPRK despite strong protest at home and abroad, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 If a nuclear war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, it will immediately spill over into a thermonuclear war not only in Northeast Asia but also in the rest of the world and thus entail catastrophic consequences.
					
					 The RBCK vehemently denounces, on behalf of all religious believers in the northern half of the republic, the U.S. and south Korean warmongers' joint military drills for aggression, terming them a blatant challenge to peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula and the improvement of the north-south relations and a criminal act of threatening global peace and security and existence of humankind.
					
					 It is the doctrine of religious belief and mission of religious believers to desire good will and punish evils and defend justice and peace.
					
					 Now is the time for all the Korean religious believers in the north and the south and abroad to decisively turn out in the patriotic and sacred struggle for sending to hell the groups of evils keen to throw the space for the nation's existence into disaster of a nuclear war.
					
					 The RBCK appeals to all religious believers in the north and the south and abroad to come out in the sacred struggle for punishing the groups of Satan which are making desperate efforts to inflict a horrible nuclear disaster upon the nation, openly challenging all compatriots aspiring after national reconciliation and unity and peace and reunification.
					
					 It also expresses hope that all religious believers and organizations of the world who regard love, justice and peace as their ideal would extend full support to the Korean people in their just struggle against the U.S. and puppet warmongers' nuclear war moves and for peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world.

articles.title: More Meetings Held to Respond to Appeal of Creators of Spirit of Kangwon Province
articles.content:
More Meetings Held to Respond to Appeal of Creators of Spirit of Kangwon Province
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Mass Meetings took place in Jagang and Ryanggang provinces and Rason City on Thursday to respond to the appeal sent by the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province to all working people across the country.
					 Present at the meetings were officials of party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, factories, enterprises, farms and universities and workers and youth and students in the provinces and city.
					
					 The appeal was read out and representatives of officials, workers, agricultural workers and intellectuals made speeches.
					
					 The speakers said all officials, party members and other people are filled with enthusiasm to demonstrate their honor as frontrunners of the ongoing Mallima movement in hearty response to the appeal.
					
					 They hardened the will to devotedly implement the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the Party policies given to their fields and units without fail like the people in Kwangwon Province.
					
					 They underlined the need for all sectors and units to conduct a bold campaign for increased production and creation by dint of self-reliance and self-development and thus attain earlier the goals set for this year, the year of key importance in carrying out the 5-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 The meetings were followed by public processions.

articles.title: Anniversary of Foreign Language Books Publishing House Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Foreign Language Books Publishing House Marked
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Language Books Publishing House marked its 70th birthday with due ceremony on Friday.
					 President Kim Il Sung visited the Textbook Compiling Department of the Education Bureau of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea on November 6, Juche 35 (1946) and took a step of founding a publishing house specializing in translation of advanced sci-tech books and compilation of foreign language textbooks.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the publishing house several times, advanced the tasks to firmly equip the journalists and editors with the revolutionary idea of the President and the idea of the Party and compile Juche-based textbooks, set March 11, Juche 36 (1947) when the Translation Section was organized in the Textbooks Compilation Department of the Education Bureau of The People's Committee of North Korea as the day of its foundation and led it to bring about innovations in carrying out its revolutionary duty.
					
					 Since its foundation, the publishing house has written and compiled at least  1,000 kinds of dictionaries and latest sci-tech books, foreign language textbooks, reference books and books for intellectual development of children for the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education, and published thousands of kinds of translated books.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of Kim Po Hyon University Marked
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of Kim Po Hyon University Marked
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Po Hyon University marked the 70th anniversary of its founding.
					 The university is an agricultural cadre-training institution.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded a centre for training agricultural cadres of North Korea, the predecessor of the university, on March 11, Juche 36 (1947). He made sure that the work for training cadres was conducted nonstop even in the days of the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War and clearly indicated the orientation and way for developing the work of the university in every period of the developing revolution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il named the university Kim Po Hyon University on August 11, 1994, reflecting the will to let it train cadres who would carry forward the patriotic spirit of Kim Po Hyon, and led it to improve its education.
					
					 The teaching staff of the university have devoted all their wisdom and energies to training agricultural cadres, true to the education policy of the Workers' Party of Korea, and are firmly preparing its students as pillars for the socialist rural construction.
					
					 A meeting to mark the day was held on Friday.

articles.title: Pyongyang Marine Transport Company Marks Its 70th Birthday
articles.content:
Pyongyang Marine Transport Company Marks Its 70th Birthday
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Marine Transport Company marked its 70th birthday with due ceremony on Friday.
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the company on March 11, Juche 36 (1947), and indicated the way to be followed by it.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il paid attention to the improvement of transport on the River Taedong, gave a series of instructions to the company and repeatedly sent it modern passenger boats and equipment.
					
					 Since its foundation, the company has turned into a marine transport base equipped with many passenger and freight boats and good ship overhauling facilities.

articles.title: Turf-planting Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Turf-planting Progresses Apace in Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Turf-planting has been pushed forward in Ryomyong Street now under completion.
					 Pyongyang City began planting turf from March 5 and grassed over 120,000 square meters of land. And due measures have been taken one after another to create conditions for the growth of turf.
					
					 The city sowed 170,000 square meters of land with turf to get sods ready beforehand.
					
					 Meanwhile, scientists and researchers of the State Academy of Sciences supply relevant units with various nutrient solutions good for raising the rooting rate and promoting the growth.

articles.title: Kangwon Province Taking Lead in Improving Teaching Methods
articles.content:
Kangwon Province Taking Lead in Improving Teaching Methods
Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Many achievements have been made by Kangwon Province of the DPRK in improving teaching methods.
					 Last year, a number of valuable teaching methods, hundreds of thousands of teaching plans and over 1 000 multimedia programs were completed in the province.
					
					 The province set Wonsan Secondary School No. 1 as a model.
					
					 City and county educational institutions encourage teachers to apply modern educational means and multi-functional visual aids to teaching and regularly organize the work to generalize achievements and experience gained by advanced units like Hero Munchon Senior Middle School in Munchon City and Wonsok Secondary School No. 1 in Wonsan City.
					
					 The province has also paid deep attention to training in-service teachers and providing all necessities for the education based on visual aids and multi-media programs.

articles.title: DPRK Will Always Emerge Victorious: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Always Emerge Victorious: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The great success in the test-launch of surface-to-surface medium long-range ballistic missile Pukguksong-2 was a thrilling event that demonstrated the tremendous national power and stamina of Juche Korea and a great victory that humbled the arrogance of the U.S. keen to stifle it, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is an undeniable stark reality that U.S. bases can never escape the DPRK's retaliatory nuclear strike of justice no matter where they are located.
					
					 The U.S. brought about this consequence by itself. The U.S. was so foolish to calculate that the DPRK would no longer survive the sustained and tough sanctions and blockade but surrender any time.
					
					 It was utterly ignorant of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is now getting frantic under the eyes of the DPRK, slapping additional sanctions against it and bringing nuclear aircraft carrier and nuclear strategic bombers to south Korea and its vicinity, but it is no more than bluffing of the stupid.
					
					 It is just a wild dream that can never come true to browbeat the DPRK and do something with such a trite method.
					
					 The U.S. goes so foolish as to try to prick its own eyes with its own fingers.
					
					 The DPRK cannot but take toughest countermeasures to bolster its nuclear force as already clarified now that the U.S. launched risky nuclear war drills again at its doorstep. The former will get stronger and the final doom of the latter will come earlier.
					
					 It has recorded only signal victories in the history of protracted confrontation with the U.S. century after century. Such brilliant history and tradition are going on.
					
					 Victory will always be in store for the DPRK.

articles.title: Nothing Can Beat United Force of Various Circles in S. Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nothing Can Beat United Force of Various Circles in S. Korea: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- When the people from all walks of life in south Korea, including opposition parties, get united in the struggle to achieve a common purpose of ousting Park Geun Hye, the puppet conservative group will prove powerless, however desperate they may go, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Civic organizations of different social standings and people of south Korea are carrying on their candlelight actions with the will not to step back till a decision is made to impeach Park Geun Hye.
					
					 What merits attention is that solidarity actions of forces of opposition parties to impeach the witch of Chongwadae are getting intensified in step with mounting candlelight actions.
					
					 Such solidarity activities and joint struggle of the south Korean opposition parties against traitor Park Geun Hye reflect the people's aspiration and wishes.
					
					 The Park group is making last-ditch efforts to quell the mind-set of the participants in the candlelight actions in a bid to prolong its dirty remaining days.
					
					 When the forces of opposition parties are positively joining in the south Korean people's struggle for the resignation of the regime of traitors, the Park group are spouting out a litany of such invective as "attempt to seize 'power' backed by the north", not content with letting out rhetoric that "demand for impeachment is threat and blackmail" and "politically-motivated pressure and offensive".
					
					 It labels candlelight rallies "riots of Reds" in an effort to create terror-ridden atmosphere in the society, openly trumpeting about terrorism, assassination and military coup.
					
					 Against this backdrop the ultra-right conservatives of the "Oboi Association" and other riff-raffs, bribed by the Park group, are frantically staging meetings against impeachment. Meanwhile, the group of Park's judicial representatives is running the whole gamut of hooliganism to cover up the crimes of the witch of Chongwadae.
					
					 The situation goes to prove that the progressive and democratic forces of south Korea should get united as one in the joint actions to foil the conservatives' last-ditch efforts to escape the judgment by history and keep their regime afloat.

articles.title: DPRK-targeted Nuclear War Exercises Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK-targeted Nuclear War Exercises Flailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification held a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on March 7 in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers' anti-DPRK nuclear war exercises, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers at the press conference charged that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are getting hell-bent on Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises while working hard to deploy THAAD.
					
					 They called on all Koreans in the south and the north and abroad to join their efforts to halt the THAAD deployment and war exercises, a very big danger to the nation.
					
					 They stressed that peace can be achieved on the Korean peninsula only when the U.S. forces are pulled out of south Korea and the Armistice Agreement is replaced by a peace treaty.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Demand Halt to THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Demand Halt to THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The Council of Christian Churches in south Korea on March 7 denounced the military authorities' moves to deploy THAAD, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 It accused the military authorities of committing acts for which they can never be responsible ahead of the decision on the impeachment of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 They demanded the military authorities immediately halt the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Puppet Regime's Moves to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Puppet Regime's Moves to Deploy THAAD
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on March 8 denounced the puppet regime for its dangerous moves to deploy THAAD. 
					 The editorial noted that the U.S. and the puppet regime on March 6 introduced parts of THAAD all of a sudden.
					
					 It said that lurking behind such hasty move is a sinister intention to make the physical dismantlement of THAAD difficult even after the regime change.
					
					 It pointed to the high likelihood of rapidly escalating tension on the Korean peninsula due to this action.

articles.title: S. Korea: Immediate Withdrawal of THAAD Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Immediate Withdrawal of THAAD Urged
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations of south Korea, including the Songju Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment, the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment and the Women's Action against THAAD Deployment, reportedly held an emergency press conference outside the ministry of defence on Tuesday to condemn the U.S. and the puppet authorities for unilaterally deploying THAAD in south Korea without any legal ground.
					 In a press release the organizations charged that the puppet defence ministry announced two launching pads and some equipment were brought to the Osan U.S. air-force base and all other THAAD systems would be deployed within one or two months.
					
					 This amounts to an undemocratic action of blatantly challenging the demand of the people for the cancellation of THAAD deployment, typical of Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil's evils, they said.
					
					 They demanded an immediate stop to THAAD deployment and withdrawal of all the related equipment.

articles.title: U.S. THAAD Deployment Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. THAAD Deployment Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- People of all social strata in south Korea are reportedly staging vigorous actions against the U.S. introduction of launching pads and other equipment of THAAD.
					 The People's Emergency Action for the Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime released a statement on March 7 to urge the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the THAAD deployment and withdraw the related equipment.
					
					 The People's Action against THAAD and for Banishing Anthrax Germs held a press conference in front of the Osan U.S. air-force base on March 8 at which it demanded the prompt withdrawal of the introduced equipment of THAAD.
					
					 The Kimchon Citizens Measure Committee against THAAD Deployment held a rally at the plaza of Kimchon railway station on March 8 to condemn the puppet authorities' moves for its deployment.

articles.title: Int'l Kothongryon Publishes Magazine Thongil
articles.content:
Int'l Kothongryon Publishes Magazine Thongil
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) published the 2017 January-February issue of Thongil, its monthly magazine.
					 The magazine highlights the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, illustrated with photos of him inspecting the Pyongyang Bag Factory, the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, the Ryugyong Kimchi Factory, Ryomyong Street under construction, Pyongyang Orphans' Primary School and others.
					
					 Seen in the magazine is an article titled "To cover the sky with palm" written by Russian experts to disclose the truth behind the abuse of "administration" by Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil in south Korea and intensively analyze the struggle of the south Korean people demanding the impeachment of Park.
					
					 It also carried news on the economic cooperation between the DPRK and Russia, data on folk holidays such as the lunar New Year's Day and the January 15th of lunar calendar and international news.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Russian websites praised the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Posted on them were art pieces depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and photos of Kim Jong Il and pictures depicting him.
					
					 Zebri Deve, an online paper of Khabarovsk Territory, said in articles that Kim Jong Il led the Korean people to invariably go along the road of independence, Songun and socialism by inheriting the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 An online magazine Lemchich elaborated on the ideo-theoretical exploits and Songun leadership feats Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of the times and history after being born as the Shining Star of Mt Paektu.
					
					 The website Irkutskblogspot. ru and websites of the Khabarovsk Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Tynda Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Eastern Siberian Publishing House in Irkutsk Region carried such articles as "Appearance of a great man", "Kim Jong Il, his birth and the world" and "Korea's February and leader Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The articles told about the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il who devoted all his life only to the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, March 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included meetings, seminars, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Nepal, Laos, Thailand, China, Singapore, Belarus, Sweden and Austria from February 9 to 15.
					
					 Korean films such as "Kimjongilia" were shown.
					
					 The chairman of the C.C., Nepal Worker-Peasant Party said that the DPRK had strengthened its capability for self-defense under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, adding: The DPRK with tremendous military strength is the only country in the world that resolutely stands against the arbitrariness of the U.S.
					
					 The director of the Lao Defense Ministry said that Kim Jong Il is the great leader as he turned the DPRK into a socialist power possessed of invincible military capabilities with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea and other personages of Thailand lauded the feats Kim Jong Il performed to build the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 The chairman of the Belorussian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the Korean people could defend socialism and make admirable achievements in all fields even in the period of unprecedented ordeals.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea stressed that with the treasured sword of Songun Kim Jong Il smashed every machination of the imperialists and provided strong military deterrence that can safeguard the peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Nepal.

articles.title: "Corte Constitucional" del Sur de Corea sentencia la dimision de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
"Corte Constitucional" del Sur de Corea sentencia la dimision de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos en Seul, la "Corte Constitucional" del Sur de Corea sentencio el dia 10 la dimision de Park Geun-hye en medio de la energica lucha multitudinaria del pueblo surcoreano por destituirla.
					Al cabo de la investigacion de juicio de 3 meses sobre la mocion de dimision de Park, aprobada el 9 de diciembre del ano pasado en la "Asamblea Nacional", la Corte Constitucional decidio este dia la dimision con el consentimiento unanime de 8 jueces.
					
					Asi, Park fue depuesta del cargo "presidencial" cuando le falta un ano para cumplir su mandato y sera sometida a la pesquisa intensa como delincuente comun.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRC llama a la lucha contra la horda de satanicos
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRC llama a la lucha contra la horda de satanicos
Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- El vocero del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea publico el dia 10 una declaracion denunciando a los Estados Unidos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos que intentan imponer los desastres de guerra nuclear a la nacion coreana. 
					Como ya trascendidos, pese a la fuerte protesta de los nacionales y extranjeros, EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos iniciaron el dia primero los ejercicios militares conjuntos de caracter agresivo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que duraran casi dos meses, revela la nota y continua:
					
					La guerra nuclear, que se desate en la Peninsula Coreana, se extendera en un instante a la termonuclear de alcance global para no hablar del Nordeste Asiatico y causara las consecuencias catastroficas. 
					
					En nombre de todos los religiosos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Consejo de Religiosos de Corea condena categoricamente los entrenamientos belicos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea calificandolos de desafio frontal y acto criminal que impide la paz y reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y amenaza la paz y seguridad del mundo y la subsistencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Es el proposito principal de la religion y la mision de los creyentes aspirar a la bondad, castigar el mal y defender la justicia y la paz. 
					
					Ahora es cuando todos los religiosos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la sagrada lucha por echar en las Calderas de Pedro Botero a la horda de los malvados que amenazan con el arma nuclear el espacio de existencia de la nacion. 
					
					El CRC exhorta a todos los religiosos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar a incorporarse en la sagrada lucha por castigar a la horda de satanicos que quieren hacer sufrir los desastres nucleares a la nacion desafiando frontalmente a la aspiracion de todos los compatriotas a la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la paz y la reunificacion. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, expresa la esperanza de que todos los religiosos del mundo y sus entidades, que toman por su ideal el amor, la justicia y la paz, envien el apoyo total y la solidaridad a la justa lucha del pueblo coreano contra la provocacion de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos y por la defensa de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.

articles.title: Continuan mitines multitudinarios en varias provincias
articles.content:
Continuan mitines multitudinarios en varias provincias
Pyongyang, 10 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar la vispera en las provincias de Jagang y Ryanggang y la cuidad de Rason los mitines multitudinarios en respuesta al llamamiento enviado a todos los trabajadores del pais por los creadores del Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon.
					Asistieron en las ocasiones los funcionarios de los organos del partido, el Poder y la economia de las localidades, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de respectivas localidades.
					
					En las ocasiones se dio lectura al llamamiento arriba mencionado y hubo intervenciones de juramento de los representantes de funcionarios, obreros, trabajadores agricolas e intelectuales.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores deben responder al llamamiento de los creadores del Espiritu de la Provincia de Kangwon y glorificar en la ofensiva general de hoy el honor del jinete y el precursor de Mallima.
					
					Dijeron que deben materializar sin falta aun en medio dificil los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dejados en sus ramas y unidades, y la politica del partido como lo hicieron los habitantes de la provincia de Kangwon.
					
					Refirieron que todos los sectores y entidades deben cumplir con anticipacion la meta de batalla del presente ano, que tiene capital importancia en el cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, librando la lucha por el aumento de produccion y la creacion con el poderio de autofortalecimiento.
					
					Acto seguido hubo manifestaciones multitudinarias.
